name: BulkLoader
description: Telegram Bot to Download list of urls and Upload to Telegram.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Your bot token, as a string.

OWNER_ID.description: Your telegram id, not username. Open https://t.me/MissRose_bot and send /id to bot. Left empty if you want bot public

AS_ZIP.description: True: will zip all files and upload as zipfile | False: will upload files one by one

BUTTONS.description: True: will send buttons (Zip or One by One) instead of AZ_ZIP | False: will do as you've fill on AZ_ZIP
